name: EventCustom
description: This event allows you to create and trigger your own custom events with custom data. Backed by class EventCustom.
overview:
Allows creation of user-defined events with custom data.
Can store various data types (int, string, double, boolean, objects).
Events can be triggered manually using trigger() or triggerAsync().
Custom events can be registered to appear in the GUI.
Supports both synchronous and asynchronous triggering.

constructors.description: Creates a new custom event instance.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The name of the custom event. Avoid using the name of an existing event

methods.name: trigger
methods.description: Triggers the event and executes all registered listeners. Be careful not to cause infinite loops by triggering the same custom event from within its own listeners.

methods.name: triggerAsync
methods.description: Triggers the event asynchronously and runs a callback after completion. The callback runs as a Runnable with no arguments and no return value.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to run after all listeners finish

methods.name: putInt
methods.description: Stores an integer value in the event data.

methods.name: putString
methods.description: Stores a string value in the event data.

methods.name: putDouble
methods.description: Stores a double value in the event data.

methods.name: putBoolean
methods.description: Stores a boolean value in the event data.

methods.name: putObject
methods.description: Stores any object value in the event data. Cannot store guest objects in events.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the type of data stored under the given name. Returns one of: 'Int', 'String', 'Double', 'Boolean', 'Object', or null.

methods.name: getInt
methods.description: Retrieves an integer value from the event data. Returns null if not found or wrong type.

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Retrieves a string value from the event data. Returns null if not found or wrong type.

methods.name: getDouble
methods.description: Retrieves a double value from the event data. Returns null if not found or wrong type.

methods.name: getBoolean
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean value from the event data. Returns null if not found or wrong type.

methods.name: getObject
methods.description: Retrieves an object value from the event data. Returns null if not found.

methods.name: getUnderlyingMap
methods.description: Returns the underlying map that stores the event data.

methods.name: registerEvent
methods.description: Registers this custom event so it appears in the GUI. This makes the custom event visible in the JsMacros GUI for easy macro creation.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
